title: Friendsgiving: Part 2
description:
The first-ever Bachelor Happy Hour Friendsgiving continues with more stories from “The Bachelor” and a game of Never Have I Ever! Joining hosts Rachel and Bryan Abasolo are Kendall Long, Joe Amabile, Katie Morton, Eric Bigger and Tayshia Adams. Plus, don’t miss a surprise call-in from new Bachelor Peter.

Be sure to rate and subscribe so you never miss an episode.

Thanks to our sponsors:

Your Super: YourSuper.com/ code BACHELOR

Rothy’s: Rothys.com/bhh

Care/Of: TakeCareOf.com/ code BACHELOR50
